This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is not only functional but also a symbol of excellence. I look forward to hearing your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
